string.tiptext: stop method

string.name: seek
string.tiptext: seek method

string.name: seekSeconds
string.tiptext: seekSeconds method

string.name: seekPercent
string.tiptext: seekPercent method

string.name: seekToNavCuePoint
string.tiptext: Seeks to a navigation cue point that matches the specified time, name, or time and name.

string.name: seekToNextNavCuePoint
string.tiptext: Seeks to the next navigation cue point, based on the current value of the playheadTime property.

string.name: seekToPrevNavCuePoint
string.tiptext: Seeks to the previous navigation cue point, based on the current value of the playheadTime property.

string.name: addASCuePoint
string.tiptext: Adds an ActionScript cue point and has the same effect as adding an ActionScript cue point using the Cue Points dialog box, except that it occurs when an application executes rather than during application development.

string.name: removeASCuePoint
string.tiptext: Removes an ActionScript cue point from the currently loaded FLV file.

string.name: findCuePoint
string.tiptext: Finds the cue point of the type specified by the type parameter and having the time, name, or combination of time and name that you specify through the parameters.

string.name: findNearestCuePoint
string.tiptext: Finds a cue point of the specified type that matches or is earlier than the time that you specify.

string.name: findNextCuePointWithName
string.tiptext: Finds the next cue point in my_cuePoint.array that has the same name as my_cuePoint.name.

string.name: setFLVCuePointEnabled
string.tiptext: Enables or disables one or more FLV file cue points.

string.name: isFLVCuePointEnabled
string.tiptext: Returns false if the FLV file embedded cue point is disabled.

string.name: bringVideoPlayerToFront
string.tiptext: Brings a video player to the front of the stack of video players.

string.name: getVideoPlayer
string.tiptext: Gets the video player specified by the index parameter.

string.name: closeVideoPlayer
string.tiptext: Closes NetStream and deletes the video player specified by the index parameter.

string.name: VERSION
string.tiptext: State variable indicating the long version number of the component.

string.name: SHORT_VERSION
string.tiptext: State variable indicating the short version number of the component.

string.name: playheadPercentage
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the current playheadTime as a percentage of the totalTime property.

string.name: preview
string.tiptext: Only for live preview.

string.name: activeVideoPlayerIndex
string.tiptext: A number that specifies which video player instance is affected by other application programming interfaces (APIs).

string.name: align
string.tiptext: Specifies the video layout when the scaleMode property is set to VideoScaleMode.MAINTAIN_ASPECT_RATIO or VideoScaleMode.NO_SCALE.

string.name: autoPlay
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that, if set to true, causes the FLV file to start playing automatically after the source property is set.

string.name: autoRewind
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that, if true, causes the FLV file to rewind to Frame 1 when play stops, either because the player reached the end of the stream or the stop() method was called.

string.name: bitrate
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the bits per second at which to transfer the FLV file.

string.name: buffering
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the video is in a buffering state.

string.name: bufferingBar
string.tiptext: Buffering bar control.

string.name: bufferingBarHidesAndDisablesOthers
string.tiptext: If set to true, hides the SeekBar control and disables the Play, Pause, PlayPause, BackButton and ForwardButton controls while the FLV file is in the buffering state.

string.name: backButton
string.tiptext: BackButton playback control.

string.name: bufferTime
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the number of seconds to buffer in memory before beginning to play a video stream.

string.name: bytesLoaded
string.tiptext: A number that indicates the extent of downloading, in number of bytes, for an HTTP download.

string.name: bytesTotal
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the total number of bytes downloaded for an HTTP download.

string.name: source
string.tiptext: A string that specifies the URL of the FLV file to stream and how to stream it.

string.name: cuePoints
string.tiptext: An array that describes ActionScript cue points and disabled embedded FLV file cue points.

string.name: forwardButton
string.tiptext: Forward button control.

string.name: fullScreenBackgroundColor
string.tiptext: Background color used when in full-screen takeover mode.

string.name: fullScreenButton
string.tiptext: FullScreen button control.

string.name: fullScreenSkinDelay
string.tiptext: Specifies the delay time in milliseconds to hide the skin.

string.name: fullScreenTakeOver
string.tiptext: When the stage enters full-screen mode, the FLVPlayback component is on top of all content and takes over the entire screen.

string.name: height
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the height of the FLVPlayback instance.

string.name: idleTimeout
string.tiptext: The amount of time, in milliseconds, before Flash terminates an idle connection to Flash Media Server (FMS) because playing paused or stopped.

string.name: isRTMP
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the FLV file is streaming from Flash Media Server (FMS) using RTMP.

string.name: isLive
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the video stream is live.

string.name: metadata
string.tiptext: An object that is a metadata information packet that is received from a call to the NetSteam.onMetaData() callback method, if available.

string.name: metadataLoaded
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if a metadata packet has been encountered and processed or if the FLV file was encoded without the metadata packet.

string.name: muteButton
string.tiptext: Mute button control.

string.name: ncMgr
string.tiptext: An INCManager object that provides access to an instance of the class implementing INCManager, which is an interface to the NCManager class.

string.name: pauseButton
string.tiptext: Pause button control.

string.name: paused
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the FLV file is in a paused state.

string.name: playButton
string.tiptext: Play button control.

string.name: playheadTime
string.tiptext: A number that is the current playhead time or position, measured in seconds, which can be a fractional value.

string.name: playheadUpdateInterval
string.tiptext: A number that is the amount of time, in milliseconds, between each playheadUpdate event.

string.name: playing
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the FLV file is in the playing state.

string.name: playPauseButton
string.tiptext: Play/pause button control.

string.name: preferredHeight
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the height of the source FLV file.

string.name: preferredWidth
string.tiptext: Gives the width of the source FLV file.

string.name: progressInterval
string.tiptext: A number that is the amount of time, in milliseconds, between each progress event.

string.name: registrationX
string.tiptext: The x coordinate used to align the video content when autoresizing.

string.name: registrationY
string.tiptext: The y coordinate used to align the video content when autoresizing.

string.name: registrationWidth
string.tiptext: The width used to align the video content when autoresizing.

string.name: registrationHeight
string.tiptext: The height used to align the video content when autoresizing.

string.name: scaleMode
string.tiptext: Specifies how the video will resize after loading.

string.name: scaleX
string.tiptext: A number that is the horizontal scale.

string.name: scaleY
string.tiptext: A number that is the vertical scale.

string.name: scrubbing
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the user is scrubbing with the SeekBar and false otherwise.

string.name: seekBar
string.tiptext: The SeekBar control.

string.name: seekBarInterval
string.tiptext: A number that specifies, in milliseconds, how often to check the SeekBar handle when scrubbing.

string.name: seekBarScrubTolerance
string.tiptext: A number that specifies how far a user can move the SeekBar handle before an update occurs.

string.name: seekToPrevOffset
string.tiptext: The number of seconds that the seekToPrevNavCuePoint() method uses when it compares its time against the previous cue point.

string.name: skin
string.tiptext: A string that specifies the URL to a skin SWF file.

string.name: skinAutoHide
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that, if true, hides the component skin when the mouse is not over the video.

string.name: skinBackgroundAlpha
string.tiptext: The alpha for the background of the skin.

string.name: skinBackgroundColor
string.tiptext: The color for the background of the skin (0xRRGGBB).

string.name: skinFadeTime
string.tiptext: The amount of time in milliseconds that it takes for the skin to fade in or fade out when hiding or showing.

string.name: soundTransform
string.tiptext: Provides direct access to the VideoPlayer.soundTransform property to expose more sound control.

string.name: state
string.tiptext: A string that specifies the state of the component.

string.name: stateResponsive
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the state is responsive.

string.name: stopButton
string.tiptext: The Stop button control.

string.name: stopped
string.tiptext: A Boolean value that is true if the state of the FLVPlayback instance is stopped.

string.name: totalTime
string.tiptext: A number that is the total playing time for the video in seconds.

string.name: visibleVideoPlayerIndex
string.tiptext: A number that you can use to manage multiple FLV file streams.

string.name: volume
string.tiptext: A number in the range of 0 to 1 that indicates the volume control setting.

string.name: volumeBar
string.tiptext: The volume bar control.

string.name: volumeBarInterval
string.tiptext: A number that specifies, in milliseconds, how often to check the volume bar handle location when scrubbing.

string.name: volumeBarScrubTolerance
string.tiptext: A number that specifies how far a user can move the volume bar handle before an update occurs.

string.name: width
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the width of the FLVPlayback instance on the Stage.

string.name: x
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the horizontal position (in pixels) of the video player.

string.name: y
string.tiptext: A number that specifies the vertical position (in pixels) of the video player.

string.name: autoLayout
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the video player is resized or laid out automatically.

string.name: autoRewound
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the playhead is moved to the start of the video player because the autoRewind property is set to true.

string.name: bufferingStateEntered
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the FLVPlayback instance enters the buffering state.

string.name: close
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the event object closes the NetConnection, by timing out or through a call to the closeVideoPlayer() method or when you call the load() or play() methods or set the source property and cause the RTMP connection to close as a result.

string.name: complete
string.tiptext: Dispatched when playing completes because the player reached the end of the FLV file.

string.name: cuePoint
string.tiptext: Dispatched when a cue point is reached.

string.name: fastForward
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the location of the playhead moves forward by a call to the seek() method or by clicking the ForwardButton control.

string.name: metadataReceived
string.tiptext: Dispatched the first time the FLV file's metadata is reached.

string.name: pausedStateEntered
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the player enters the paused state.

string.name: playingStateEntered
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the playing state is entered.

string.name: playheadUpdate
string.tiptext: Dispatched while the FLV file is playing at the frequency specified by the playheadUpdateInterval property or when rewinding starts.

string.name: progress
string.tiptext: Indicates progress made in number of bytes downloaded.

string.name: ready
string.tiptext: Dispatched when an FLV file is loaded and ready to display.

string.name: layout
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the video player is resized or laid out.

string.name: rewind
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the location of the playhead moves backward by a call to seek() or when an autoRewind call is completed.

string.name: scrubFinish
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the user stops scrubbing the FLV file with the seek bar.

string.name: scrubStart
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the user begins scrubbing the FLV file with the seek bar.

string.name: seeked
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the location of the playhead is changed by a call to seek() or by setting the playheadTime property or by using the SeekBar control.

string.name: skinError
string.tiptext: Dispatched when an error occurs loading a skin SWF file.

string.name: skinLoaded
string.tiptext: Dispatched when a skin SWF file is loaded.

string.name: stateChange
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the playback state changes.

string.name: stoppedStateEntered
string.tiptext: Dispatched when entering the stopped state.

string.name: soundUpdate
string.tiptext: Dispatched when sound changes by the user either moving the handle of the volumeBar control or setting the volume or soundTransform property.

folder.name: FLVPlaybackCaptioning
folder.tiptext: The FLVPlaybackCaptioning component enables captioning for the FLVPlayback component.

string.name: FLVPlaybackCaptioning
string.tiptext: Creates a new FLVPlaybackCaptioning instance.

string.name: VERSION
string.tiptext: State variable indicating the long version number of the component.

string.name: SHORT_VERSION
string.tiptext: State variable indicating the short version number of the component.

string.name: showCaptions
string.tiptext: Used to display captions; true = display captions, false = do not display captions.

string.name: source
string.tiptext: URL of the Timed Text XML file that contains caption information (required property).

string.name: autoLayout
string.tiptext: Determines whether the FLVPlaybackCaptioning component automatically moves and resizes the TextField object for captioning.

string.name: captionTargetName
string.tiptext: The instance name of the TextField object or MovieClip enclosing a Textfield object that contains the captions.

string.name: captionTarget
string.tiptext: Sets the DisplayObject instance in which to display captions.

string.name: captionButton
string.tiptext: Defines the captionButton FLVPlayback custom UI component instance which provides toggle capabilities to turn captioning on and off.

string.name: flvPlaybackName
string.tiptext: Sets an FLVPlayback instance name for the FLVPlayback instance that you want to caption.

string.name: flvPlayback
string.tiptext: Sets the FLVPlayback instance to caption.

string.name: track
string.tiptext: Support for multiple language tracks.

string.name: videoPlayerIndex
string.tiptext: Connects the captioning to a specific VideoPlayer in the FLVPlayback component.

string.name: simpleFormatting
string.tiptext: Limits formatting instructions from the Timed Text file when set to true.

string.name: captionChange
string.tiptext: Dispatched when a caption is added or removed from the caption target text field.

string.name: captionTargetCreated
string.tiptext: Dispatched after the captionTarget property is created, but before any captions are added (the captionTarget property is empty).

string.name: complete
string.tiptext: Dispatched after all of the Timed Text XML data is loaded.

string.name: httpStatus
string.tiptext: Dispatched if a call to the URLLoader.load() event attempts to access a Timed Text XML file over HTTP and the current Flash Player environment is able to detect and return the status code for the request.

string.name: ioError
string.tiptext: Dispatched if a call to the URLLoader.load() event results in a fatal error that terminates the download of the Timed Text XML file.

string.name: open
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the download operation to load the Timed Text XML file begins, following a call to the URLLoader.load() method.

string.name: progress
string.tiptext: Dispatched when data is received as the download of the Timed Text XML file progresses.

string.name: securityError
string.tiptext: Dispatched if a call to the URLLoader.load() event attempts to load a Timed Text XML file from a server outside the security sandbox.

folder.name: INCManager
folder.tiptext: The INCManager is the interface for classes that create the flash.net.NetConnection for the VideoPlayer class.

string.name: connectToURL
string.tiptext: Called by the VideoPlayer object to ask for a connection to the URL.

string.name: connectAgain
string.tiptext: Called by the VideoPlayer object if the connection is successfully made but the stream is not found.

string.name: reconnect
string.tiptext: Called by the VideoPlayer object to ask for reconnection after the connection is lost.

string.name: helperDone
string.tiptext: Called by any helper object doing a task for the NCManager object to signal it has completed and whether it was successful.

string.name: close
string.tiptext: Closes the NetConnection.

string.name: getProperty
string.tiptext: Gets values of arbitrary properties supported by the class implementing INCManager.

string.name: setProperty
string.tiptext: Sets values of arbitrary properties supported by the class implementing INCManager.

string.name: videoPlayer
string.tiptext: The VideoPlayer object that owns this object.

string.name: timeout
string.tiptext: The time in milliseconds after which attempts to make a connection stop.

string.name: netConnection
string.tiptext: Reference to the NetConnection object.

string.name: bitrate
string.tiptext: The bandwidth, in bits per second, used to switch between multiple streams.

string.name: streamName
string.tiptext: The stream name passed into the NetStream.play() method.

string.name: isRTMP
string.tiptext: Whether the URL is for RTMP streaming from a Flash Media Server (FMS) or a progressive download.

string.name: streamLength
string.tiptext: Length of the stream, in seconds.

string.name: streamWidth
string.tiptext: Width of the stream, in pixels.

string.name: streamHeight
string.tiptext: Height of the stream, in pixels.

folder.tiptext: The IVPEvent interface is implemented by video events that apply to a specific VideoPlayer object within the FLVPlayback component.

string.name: type

string.name: vp
string.tiptext: The index of the VideoPlayer object involved in this event.

string.tiptext: Defines the value of the type property of a layout event object.

string.tiptext: Indicates the values of the x, y, width, and height properties of the target before the event occurs.

string.name: oldRegistrationBounds
string.tiptext: Indicates the values of the registrationX, registrationY, registrationWidth, and registrationHeight properties of the target before the event occurs.

folder.tiptext: Flash® Player dispatches a MetadataEvent object when the user requests the FLV file's metadata information packet (NetStream.onMetaData) and when cue points (NetStream.onCuePoint) are encountered in the FLV file.

string.name: vp
string.tiptext: The index of the VideoPlayer object involved in this event.

folder.name: VideoAlign
folder.tiptext: The VideoAlign class provides constant values to use for the FLVPlayback.align and VideoPlayer.align properties.

string.name: CENTER

string.name: TOP

string.name: LEFT
